# Installation

## Using pip

The easiest way to install CaDaR is using pip:

```bash
pip install cadar
```

## Requirements

- Python 3.8 or later
- pip (Python package installer)

## Verify Installation

After installation, verify that CaDaR is working:

```python
import cadar

print(cadar.__version__)
print(cadar.ara2bizi("سلام", darija="Ma"))
```

## Installing from Source

If you want to build from source, see [Building from Source](dev/building.md).

## Troubleshooting

If you encounter any issues during installation, please check our [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/Oit-Technologies/CaDaR/issues) or create a new issue.
